 We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
*Är du redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå och vara med på en spännande resa inom IT-transformation och agil utveckling? Bli en del av vårt dynamiska team på Länsförsäkringar Fondliv och skapa framtidens lösningar!*
**Om jobbet**
 Vi på Länsförsäkringar AB söker nu en engagerad och driven DevOps Engineer till vårt Team Alpha. Teamet ansvarar för utveckling och förvaltning av kundhandlingar samt ärendehanteringssystem. Som DevOps Engineer hos oss kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att bygga och utveckla funktionalitet och lösningar som skapar ökat kundvärde. Du kommer att arbeta i ett dynamiskt team som består av både anställda och konsulter, med många kontaktytor inom organisationen.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter och ansvar kommer bestå av bland annat:
   

  

* Ansvara för utveckling och förvaltning av kundhandlingar samt ärendehanteringssystem inom Team Alpha.
* Skapa och implementera nya funktioner och lösningar i olika system för att öka kundvärdet.
* Implementera och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines för att säkerställa smidiga och effektiva utvecklings- och leveransprocesser.
* Arbeta nära andra team inom organisationen samt ha mycket kontakt med verksamheten, särskilt med Livservice och Produkt.
* Bidra till att Fondliv blir en effektiv leveransorganisation med hög kvalitet och säkerhet genom att följa och förbättra bästa praxis och standarder inom DevOps.


**Vem är du?**
 Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik för denna tjänst:
   

  

* Examen från universitet/högskola inom datavetenskap, informationsteknologi, eller ett motsvarande område.
* God professionell erfarenhet inom .NET-utveckling.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Agile/Scrum utvecklingsmiljöer.
* Följande tekniska kunskaper:
+ Goda kunskaper i C#-programmering.
+ Erfarenhet av ASP.NET, MVC och Web API.
+ Kunskap i HTML, CSS, JavaScript och minst ett modernt frontend-ramverk (exempelvis Angular, react, Blazor eller Vue.js).
+ Erfarenhet av Git och Git-baserade arbetsflöden.


 Som person är du en sann lagspelare som är pedagogisk och kombinerar din kommunikativa och analytiska förmåga för att hjälpa teamet. Ditt fokus ligger på vad teamet tillsammans framställer och levererar. Du är öppen för att dela med dig av kunskap och vidareutvecklas i arbetet på Fondliv och på vår resa mot att bli en effektiv leveransorganisation med hög kvalitet och säkerhet.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Fondliv är inne i en spännande förflyttning - både system/IT transformation såväl som vår agila resa. Vi arbetar med mycket ny teknik och erbjuder möjligheten att vara med och påverka och bygga nytt. Vår chef försöker leva upp till att vara en "Servant leader" och tror starkt på det tjänande ledarskapet med allt vad det innebär.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-09-04**

title: Solution Architect
description:
* **In order to support the new First/Last Mile Logistics Lighthouse team at our customer , we are looking for an experienced Solution Architect who can design and architect intermediate applications to support the lighthouse as well as the finalized digital solution, as well as contribute in the actual development work. The architecture work will be done in collaboration with architects from the customer.**



  




* **The consultant should have prior experience in working with data heavy digital solutions and the logistics industry. Be able to participate in discussions and workshops focusing on a wide range of aspects related to the modus operandi of our customer as a company, and how the proposed changes fit within the existing system landscape.**



  




* **The data platform and cloud environment are built on the Azure tech stack, therefore prior experience in working with the Azure tech stack, and experience in working with modern data/cloud platforms is important. Previous experience working in the logistics industry as well as with first & last mile delivery planning and route optimization is a plus.**



  




* **Our customer has chosen Microsoft Azure as the main cloud environment for developing and deploying digital applications.**



  




* **100% allocation until 31 May 2025 with possible extension.**



  





  




* **As the Solution Architect for the First/Last Mile Logistics Lighthouse you will participate and collaborate in developing architectural designs in collaboration with other architects from across the company. with the aim to ensure that all designs and solutions fit into the existing landscape of solution and and that they augment it where relevant.**



  




* **The position includes working closely with the business to identify issues and use modern digital interactions to create better, more efficient and scalable workflows.**



  




* **Understanding the existing tech landscape and being able to leverage it and/or improve it**
* **•Understanding and applying the specific context of the business**
* **Analyzing requirements**
* **Leading analysis and selection of appropriate technologies**
* **Designing, prototyping and developing digital applications**
* **Establishing the development project environment and expanding it by onboarding additional developers**



  




* **The majority of the work will be done in Solna, Sweden. Some travels to other sites could occur. We allow hybrid work practices, and if agreed with the Lighthouse manager, then it will be possible from time to time to work from home/off-site.**



  




* **The candidate will define an architectural blueprint/design, that we allow us to take the next step in scaling up the team and start building the proposed solution.**



  




* **Joining a new project with a new existing team. Working in an area that exists within our customertoday. Getting familiar with existing solutions and roadmaps will be needed.**



  





  




* **We are looking for a Solutions Architect who can architect, design, develop and maintain software applications (or able to delegate parts thereof) . Previous experience working with data-centric full-stack applications is essential. You will work as part of a Scrum team and interact with business users to understand the requirements.**



  




* **At least 5 years’ experience working with scalable cloud-based enterprise applications.**



  





  




* **Experience with Microsoft Azure services**
* **Experience with Microsoft Azure DevOps**
* **Experience with microservice architecture**
* **Experience with building frontend and backend applications that compose over REST APIs and various types of data sources (SQL, CSV, JSON)**
* **Experience with building software using SOLID principles**







* **Experience working with PySpark, Databrick and Power BI**



**• Frontend developments skills** 



* **Experience in requirement processes for UI or UX**
* **Experience in agile way of working (SCRUM)**



  




* **English is required. Fluency in Swedish is a big plus, and basic understanding of Danish and/or Norwegian is helpful.**

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. 
 



  
 



 We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to strengthen our team in Stockholm, working with our scalable Advanced Analytics products. 
 



  
 



**About the job** 
  
 



 We are working together with our colleagues from different parts of SEB to provide advanced analytics to all at SEB. Our team consists of world-class Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers. Together we design, develop and deploy ML models to GCP and deliver value from data and analytics.
 



  





 Together, we will increase the frequency of finding valuable insights within our data in the bank waiting to be found. Our team is dedicated to making data science and machine learning accessible by creating user-friendly, secure and governed tools that standardize the ways of working. 
 



  
 



 We belong to the SEB Data & Analytics tribe, an international environment with multiple agile development teams working in an enterprise superset of scrum located in Stockholm and Vilnius, consisting of experts in various Big Data and Advanced Analytics technologies. 
 



  
 



**Who are you?** 
  
 



 We are looking for an engineer with system operations experience and an interest in system development and machine learning. 
 



  
 



 You and your fellow team members will create and maintain products in the Advanced Analytics team, together with data scientists and other internal customers. 
 



  
 



 If you are analytical, curious and have a passion for problem-solving and discovering new ways of working, you will enjoy it here. Especially if you also like Swedish fika! 
 



  





**Required skills** 




 A degree in engineering, computer or data science, or equivalent work experience 
 



 Experience from designing, implementing and deploying ML models 
 



 Experience from working in Linux environments 
 



 Programming and scripting skills (e.g. Python and bash scripting) 
 



 Experience in developing services (e.g. REST APIs) 
 



 Collaboration skills and a high sense of responsibility. We always work and deliver as a team, and the ability to share knowledge and experience is fundamental.  
 



 Well-versed in matters of IT security 
 



 Automation and configuration management systems (e.g. Ansible, Terraform, Chef) 
 



 Cloud technologies, such as GCP
 



 CI/CD, such as GitHub Actions or GitLab pipelines
 



  





**Nice-to-have** 




 Programming skills in Java and Scala
 



 Experience in working with container orchestration (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift). 
 



 Data engineering experience, e.g. Apache Spark
 



 Database knowledge (RDBMS and/or NoSQL) 
 



 Knowledge of authentication and authorization services (e.g. Kerberos, LDAP, OAuth 2.0)
 



  





**Welcome with your application** 
  
 



 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to our journey. We will contact candidates on a running basis, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2024-08-31. Please note that due to the summer holiday season, responses might take a bit longer.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 As a Site Reliability Engineer you are responsible for building and maintaining shared infrastructure running on both public and private Cloud, as well as developing automation and self-services for our development teams.
   

  

 SREs are pragmatic operators and software craftspeople applying sound engineering principles, operational discipline, and mature automation to our environments and the codebase.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 We believe you are motivated with a DevOps, Agile and continuous learning mindset. You think about systems, edge cases, failure modes, behaviors and specific implementations. You have proven skills in cross-team collaboration and communication.
   

  

**To thrive in the role, we also belive you have:**
* Experience with system administration of production workloads
* Solid Linux background
* Automation: CI/CD, Jenkins, Python, Ansible, Terraform, Puppet, Argo, etc.


**Nice to have:**
* Knowledge in Kubernetes
* Experience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS or GCP


**Additional Information**
 Exiting opportunity at our brand new office in the heart of Stockholm with amazing colleagues! Join our dynamic international team and be a part of a vibrate work environment where innovation thrives. Embrace the city´s energy as you contribute to our company´s growth!
   

  

 Evolution provides a dynamic and creative work environment with a unique opportunity for the right people to enhance their skills and drive their passion. Our culture is rooted in Evolution’s core values ALIVE, do RIGHT and work TOGETHER and we operate guided by our vision to become the leading supplier of online casino in the world. Apply now and be a key player in our success story!
   

  

**Our Benefits Are**
* Competitive pension, health and medical insurance
* 30 paid vacation days
* Fitness benefit (Friskvårdsbidrag)
* Professional growth
* Sport activities, parties, team buildings

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**Ligger du i hängmattan och funderar över vad du vill göra i höst? Vad bra! Vi söker nämligen en Platform Engineer till vårt Core Platform team. Annonsen ligger uppe i sommar och vi planerar att börja hantera ansökningarna i början av v.33. Så sök nu! Njut av sommaren så hörs vi i augusti.**
**Varför tror vi att detta är rätt utmaning för just dig?** 
 Vi är ett team som har massor med spännande uppdrag inom domänen framöver och vill komplettera ett befintligt team som är fullt med driv, engagemang och kompetens. Är du nyfiken, gillar ny teknik och open source - då kommer du passa in perfekt hos oss. Sök tjänsten som Platform Engineer idag så kanske vi blir kollegor!
   

  

 Och du - det spelar ingen roll var någonstans i Sverige du bor, hos oss gör vi jobbet där det passar bäst, det kan vara från våra kontor i Solna eller Visby, eller på distans från just din bostadsort!
   

  

**Vad kommer du att göra?**
 I rollen som Platform Engineer får du chans att med nyfikenhet utforska ny teknik, arbeta med open source, ta ansvar för plattformen och bidra till hela Svenska Spels organisation genom att leverera moderna, värdeskapande plattformstjänster.
   

  

 Våra team ansvarar för olika plattformstjänster som består av ett flertal förmågor och som i sin tur byggs upp av ett flertal produkter. Nu behöver vi förstärka plattsformstjänsten Termit runtime som jobbar och ansvarar för produkter som tex, Kubernetes, Cilium, HA-Proxy, envoy med mera.
   

  

 Teamet du kommer ingå i är självgående och har stort eget bestämmande vad gäller arkitektur, implementation, drift och övervakning. Teamet består idag av Teamcoach, Tech lead, Produktägare, andra Platform Engineers samt Systemtekniker.
   

  

**Är du den som kommer att göra det?**
 Som Platform Engineer kommer du ansvara för att våra plattformar är moderna, stabila och håller hög säkerhet. För att lyckas med och dessutom trivas i den här rollen tror vi att du har en stark analytisk förmåga, har koll på omvärlden och gillar att testa nya tekniker. Du är inte rädd för att ta dig an problem som kan uppstå utan i stället försöker lösa dem med stor nyfikenhet.
   

  

 Som person är du självständig och bekväm med att ta eget ansvar, men vi hoppas att du också trivs allra bäst som en del av ett sammansvetsat team. I den här rollen är samarbete i teamet och hela domänen en naturlig del av din arbetsvardag.
   

  

 Det Var En Del Om Vad Vi Tror Är Lämpliga Personliga Egenskaper, Men Det Finns Också Några Erfarenheter Som Vi Tror Kan Vara Till Nytta För Tjänsten, Som Till Exempel
   

  

* En bakgrund som systemtekniker
* Kunskap om Linux, Kubernetes, och scriptspråk som Python
* Erfarenhet av API-gateway och nätverkstrafik inom micro service arkitektur
* Flytande svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift


 Det är också meriterande om du hanterat nätverk, verktyg som Terraform eller om du tidigare jobbat med distribuerade system med krav på hög tillgänglighet.
   

  

**Om Tech på Svenska Spel**
 På Svenska Spel hanterar vi 10 000 000 transaktioner varje dag, året runt och på sex dagar har vi hanterat samma transaktionsvolym som den största pengaöverföringsappen gör på en månad. Varje dag utvecklar, driftar och supportar vi ett av världens mest avancerade spelsystem, vi är med andra ord ett techbolag som sysslar med spel - inte tvärtom. Och som ett techbolag som sysslar med spel kommer ett ansvar, både för folks drömmar och spänning, men även för deras spelande. Det är också därför du kommer märka att vårt spelansvarsarbete genomsyrar hela företaget från första dagen du börjar jobba hos oss.
   

  

**Vi är Svenska Spel**
 Svenska Spel är hela Sveriges spelbolag. Vi skapar hållbara och roliga spelupplevelser som bidrar till ett bättre Sverige. Genom spel som Triss, Stryktipset och Oddset ger vi våra fyra miljoner kunder spänning, glädje och drömmar. Våra spel är enkla och trygga och oavsett om man spelar online eller fysiskt, själv eller tillsammans med andra, så ska upplevelsen alltid vara positiv. Vi vill att fler ska spela hållbart hos oss och vår verksamhet ska bedrivas på ett socialt, ekonomiskt och miljömässigt ansvarsfullt sätt. Varje år går överskottet till statskassan. Vi är Sveriges största idrottssponsor och investerar nära 300 miljoner kronor årligen i svensk idrott. Vi är modiga, nyfikna och strävar efter enkelhet i allt vi gör samt skapar resultat tillsammans.
   

  

 Är du nyfiken på våra förmåner? Då hittar du dem här.
   

  

  

  

**A** 
**nsökan och kontaktuppgifter**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med placering i Visby, Solna eller remote någon annanstans i Sverige. På Svenska Spel gör vi jobbet där det passar bäst, ibland är det hemifrån och ibland är det från något av våra kontor.
   

  

 Vi planerar att börja hantera ansökningarna i början av v.33 så skicka gärna in din ansökan så vi har den till dess.
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Linus Ansarfwe, Chef Core Platform Foundation, linus.ansarfwe@svenskaspel.se
   

  

 För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta Team Talent Acquisition, teamta@svenskaspel.se

title: Cybersecurity and DevSecOps Engineer
description:
**We are looking for a Cybersecurity and DevSecOps Engineer with Github pipelines and GCP experience. Cyber Engineering team fulfilment and core services. The consultant will be responsible for maintaining and developing inhouse security tooling and integrations. The consultant will help improve the Cybersecurity and cloud security posture in domain.**


### **Requirements**


* Cloud security (GCP preferred).
* Github & Github actions (CICD pipelines).
* python (or any other language).

title: Sustainability and Quality Manager (Part Time)
description:
We are looking for a new Sustainability & Quality Manager who’s available for a part time employment for approx. 1 year. The person will work cross functional within our company and closely linked with our Buying Department. If you want to join a fun workplace with high ambitions and goals and where you will have the possibility to drive change, you are welcome to apply for this exciting role!


**ABOUT THE POSITION**  

As a Sustainability & Quality Manager you will be in charge of Sustainability at large as well as being involved in daily operational functions with a strong focus on supporting the Buying team with supply chain tracking, certificates and audits (Amfori, GOTS & FSC) as well as product & supplier risk assessment, testing & quality assurance while keeping up with legal requirements and updates. The role’s success is driven by the person’s ability to develop cross-functional relationships both internal and external of The Company.


**Main Tasks will include:**


* Manage collection risk assessment and testing for our Brands KULING, Stoy, Buddy & Hope (kid’s fashion, home textiles, toys and ride ons)
* Supply Chain traceability tracking & audit follow-up via Amfori
* Supplier contract management
* Project Lead the annual GOTS & FSC Audits
* GHG emission data collection & Sustainability Reporting
* Sustainability compliance and Legislation surveillance
* Represent BSG at member organizational meetings
* Support with certificate management & product compliance
* Support with research for new and/or ongoing sustainability projects


**WHO ARE YOU?**  

We are looking for a person who has/is:


* Previous experience from a similar role, preferably within a consumer goods/retail company
* A degree within Sustainability/Supply Chain Management/Textile Engineering/Environmental Studies
* Product compliance knowledge (preferably within functional wear and/or kid’s fashion)
* Experience working with Standards and EU-Legislation
* A passion for sustainability and children’s products
* A strong proactive behavior and can-do attitude
* Solution oriented and with a flexible approach
* Well organized, with attention to details
* Good communication skills in Swedish & English (company language is in English)


**It’s a plus if you also have the following:**


* Previous experience from Project Management
* Experience in working with any of the following systems; Airtables, PIM-systems, the Amfori Platform as well as Office and Creative Cloud
* An interest in law and compliance
* Knowledge of working with certificates and quality
* Experience from working with GHG emissions data


You are structured and with a strong attention to details meanwhile as you are curious and willing to learn. We see that you have good communication skills and enjoy working cross-collaborative, both within and outside of the Company. Due to our dynamic approach, it is important that you are easily adaptable to changes and have flexibility to your workflow. Finally, we see that you are a self-starting person with a solution-oriented mindset, always searching for ways to improve efficiency and current working methods.


**WHAT WE OFFER**  

At Babyshop you will have the possibility to:


* Work in a dynamic environment, within a field of constant development
* Enjoy an international work environment with a flat organizational structure
* Work flexible and remote whenever possible according to business needs
* Work from our HQ in central Stockholm
* Work in a close collaboration with the Buying Team, gaining a broad insight in the Kids/Fashion/Retail world
* Contribute with new ideas and see a direct result of the work that you do
* Access to Babyshop discounts and sample sales


**Period:** 1 year contract starting from September (Exact dates to be agreed together)
  

**Extent:** Part-time/Flexible (2-3 days/week)  

**Location:** HQ in Central Stockholm/Remote  

**Contact person:** Joel Falck, joel.falck@babyshop.se or Erika Lindahl, erika.lindahl@babyshop.se


**ABOUT BABYSHOP GROUP**  

The journey began in 2006 when Marcus and Linn Tagesson decided to start selling baby fashion online. The rest is history and the group now operate under four main e commerce domains; www.babyshop.com, www.lekmer.se, www.alexandalexa.com and www.melijoe.com.

title: Data & Analytics Engineer
description:
### **Responsibilities**


* Develop and implement logical data models.
* Optimize data schema for read and write performance and storage.
* Design, develop and maintain data pipelines for data ingestion and transformation.
* Ensure data quality and consistency in developed data products.
* Set up and manage infrastructure resources for building data pipelines including database, cloud storage resources, data pipeline run time environments.
* Implement data governance and regulatory compliance policies.

title: Digital Director
description:
*Textile waste is a growing global challenge. Syre’s mission is to decarbonize and dewaste textiles, starting with the world's biggest fiber, polyester. By implementing true textile-to-textile recycling at hyperscale, we want to drive the transition from a linear to a circular value chain by putting textile waste to use, over and over again.*

Are you excited by the thought of contributing to the great textile shift? And, by truly being part of the green change? Then keep on reading, because Syre is now looking for someone with long experience of manufacturing related IT/OT. This crucial person will have responsibility from PLC to the cloud. As a Digital Director at Syre you will have a major impact on all the tech related decisions that will come and also be building the team that's gonna make it happen. This role reports to the CTO.


**Key tasks and responsibilities**

  

* Develop and implement digital strategies to drive business growth, enhance operational efficiency, and ensure alignment across the organizational data ecosystem.
* Champion data-driven decision making cross-functionally across the organization.
* Identify and leverage data opportunities to drive business and innovation initiatives, including tech, operations, and commercial.
* Establish and maintain robust data governance frameworks, policies, and standards.
* Ensure data quality, accuracy, and integrity across all data sources and systems.
* Promote a culture of stewardship and compliance with data protection regulations.
* Implement best practices for data architecture, data modeling, and data warehousing, ensuring the scalability and performance of data infrastructure.
* Lead the development and deployment of advanced analytics, business intelligence, and reporting solutions.
* Utilize data analytics to uncover insights, trends, and opportunities.
* Build a technical organization that can support the company goals.

**Key Qualifications**

  

* Senior profile with proven experience in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* Strategic thinker with the ability to translate data insights into business value.
* Proven track record in data management, analytics, and governance.
* Expertise in data architecture, data warehousing, big data technologies, and advanced analytics.
* Experience with data visualization tools and analytics platforms.
* Impact-oriented with a strong drive to get things done, deliver results, and optimize for speed globally (= start-up experience and mentality).
* Strong strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities.
* High ambitions with a constant drive for excellence, daring to challenge the status quo.
* Purpose-driven mentality, with a clear mission and passion for driving environmental change.

**We would prefer if you**

* Have experience in scaling tech from nothing to **big** in a IT/OT factory environment.
* Are fluent in English both orally and in writing (professional English required).

*Syre is an international company with a Swedish soul. We are a growing team of scalemakers – dedicated optimists and pioneers, together on a quest to drive the great textile shift. At Syre, we always appreciate it if you would be described as purpose-driven, action-oriented, innovative, change navigator and team player. Our team members are offered an international environment of innovation and speed, and we embrace diversity in all forms. Together we are here to build an impact company with green transition at its core – for our customers, partners, investors, and most of all, for our planet.*

 *Are you the one we’re looking for? Apply with confidence - we look forward to hearing from you (in English)!*

title: Senior Data Architect
description:
**Why Avaus?**


We are an award winning marketing and sales transformation partner in the Nordics! We are 100 colleagues located at our offices in Helsinki, Stockholm & Munich. As a company, we have more than 15 years of experience in data-driven marketing and sales in large organisations across B2C & B2B industries.


Our vision is to become the leading actionable marketing data-asset provider in Europe. We believe that to survive, companies need to invest heavily in capabilities related to intelligence & AI, customer experience, personalisation and change management. Our mission is to foster customer-centric companies equipped to grow and face the future. Our own future growth is heavily driven by activating data and analytics for our clients.

**The Team**


The market is shifting faster than ever and to keep up, companies need to invest in their data capabilities to deliver relevant and tailored content and information fit to your and your customers’ needs. This is where we come in. By utilising the latest, leading technologies combined with machine learning, we build scalable, future proof data solutions, to achieve this goal.


As a new member of our delivery team, your responsibilities involve design and development of varieties of data processing solutions. The team provides the technical backbone needed for a data-driven and personalised customer experience. At Avaus you will find a collaborative environment with lots of personal responsibility and freedom where your problem solving abilities and eagerness to learn new technologies will flourish. Here you will take ownership and drive conversations and tasks on your own initiative. We are a social crew and enjoy working closely together and learning from one another.

**The role**


As a Senior Data Architect you will work in multidisciplinary client teams. You will work in a client-facing role and work in close collaboration with our clients' business and technical stakeholders, as well as your consultant colleagues from Avaus. You will use your passion to capture and understand the requirements of complex data solutions to challenge the client. Effectiveness in a collaborative environment and valuing teamwork is one of the keys to this role.

**Who are you?**


We're looking for a person with a passion for how to use technology and data to create business results. You understand the need for and importance of continuous delivery and what's required. You have to prioritise elegance and simplicity when writing code. People describe you as a team-player and you have the ability to create valuable relationships. You have a strong sense of ownership and want to be part of our journey! Beside your personality, we would also like you to have

* Minimum Bachelor’s degree within a relevant field
* Experience in writing proposals and reviewing architectural deliverables throughout the development process to ensure quality, security and traceability in line with the enterprise data strategy
* Experience as architect and engineering lead in Data & Analytics stream
* Experience in development of data pipelines (ETL, ELT) for batch & streaming data
* Experience with database technologies such as MSSQL, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Hadoop, Snowflake
* Experience with cloud technologies such as Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure & Amazon Web Services
* Knowledge in data integration (ETL) tools including Cloud Data Fusion, Dataflow, and Dataproc. Ingestion mechanism like Flume & Kafka
* Knowledge of programming languages, e.g. Python, Java, R
* Knowledge in designing & implementing cloud infrastructure & containerized applications
* Fluent in Swedish, as our customers require us to communicate in Swedish
* Fluent in English

**Practical information**

  

This is a permanent position with a 6 months’ probation period, based at our Stockholm office at Renstiernas gata 12. Starting date as soon as possible or by agreement. We offer a hybrid remote workplace and you will report to our Head of Delivery in Sweden.


Already feel like one of us? Send your applications as soon as possible, but no later than 2023-09-16. If you have any questions about the position, please contact Ellen Lübeck.


Due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our career page.


We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Head of Software Development
description:
**Microdeb is looking to hire a talented and experienced Head of Software Development to join our team in Sweden!**

Our company is a leader in providing innovative cloud services and payment solutions to a diverse range of clients. With a robust portfolio of products, including cloud services, payment systems, and more, we are dedicated to enhancing transaction efficiency and user experience across various industries. We are now seeking a dynamic and experienced Head of Software Development to join our team in Gothenburg.


The software development team is a diverse and talented group of professionals committed to driving innovation and delivering high-quality solutions. Comprising seasoned developers, creative problem solvers, and tech enthusiasts, our team works collaboratively to push the boundaries of technology and deliver products that meet the needs of our clients. We value open communication, continuous learning, and a supportive work environment where each member can thrive and contribute to our collective success.

**Here is a little window into our company:** Microdeb was acquired by Valsoft and now operates under the Aspire Software portfolio. Aspire Software, the operational arm of Valsoft Corp, operates and manages Valsoft’s global portfolio of wholly owned software companies, providing mission-critical solutions across multiple verticals. By implementing industry best practices, Aspire delivers a time-sensitive integration process, and the operation of a decentralized model has allowed it to become a hub for creating rapid growth by reinvesting in its portfolio.

**The successful candidate will work in a hybrid work model anywhere within commutable distance of our office in Gothenburg!**

**What your day will look like:**

* Provide visionary leadership to the R&D team, fostering innovation and guiding the development of new technologies and products
* Develop and implement effective product management strategies that align with the company's goals. Drive product roadmaps, manage lifecycles, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality products
* Lead and mentor a diverse team of developers, ensuring high morale and professional growth. Implement strategies to stabilise and enhance team dynamics, ensuring continuity and minimising disruption from past management changes
* Utilise Jira for tracking, ensure timely completion of ongoing projects, and maintain a clear roadmap for future developments
* Enhance the current testing processes, implement automated regression suites, and establish staging environments to minimize deployment issues
* Manage technical debt, especially concerning legacy systems, and drive the integration and consolidation of various systems to streamline operations and improve customer satisfaction
* Collaborate with the customer support team to address technical issues efficiently, particularly with high-support-call products during peak periods
* Ensure robust security practices are in place, including managing access to production environments and utilizing appropriate security tools
* Ensure compliance with industry standards such as ISO and SOC, implementing best practices to maintain and improve security and quality across all development processes

**About You:**

* **At least a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is essential**
* **7+ years in a technology leadership role, with a proven track record in managing complex software development projects**
* **10+ years’ experience in software engineering**
* **Expertise in .NET, Windows, MS SQL Server, and experience with cloud-based multi-tenant systems. Familiarity with React and Flutter for web applications is a plus**
* Strong leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate a diverse development team
* An ability to Foster a collaborative and innovative team environment
* Excellent problem-solving abilities, particularly in managing technical debt and enhancing product performance
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to coordinate effectively between different teams and stakeholders
* Strong knowledge of software architecture and design principles
* Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities
* Excellent project management and organizational skills
* Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail
* **Fluent in English, both written and verbal, is essential**
* **Legally authorised to work in Sweden**

For information about **Microdeb,** please visit our website at https://microdeb.se

**We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only those candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.**

title: Senior Systems Consultant - Virtualization
description:
**The team, position & mission:**


Orange Business is looking for a Senior Systems Consultant to join our Virtualization team! The virtualization team is responsible for operating, maintaining and developing our virtualization infrastructure, mainly based on VMware technologies. Both shared and customer owned platforms are a part of this responsibility.


As a Systems Consultant in the Virtualization department, you will participate in the day to day operation of our virtualization infrastructure, and participate in internal and customer driven projects. You will handle the monitoring, maintenance, optimization and troubleshooting of the infrastructure. You will get to work with technologies like ESXi, vSAN, NSX-T, vCloud Director and Tanzu.  

  

The Virtualization team work closely together in a team effort to fulfill our responsibilities. To thrive in this role, you are a natural team player with a high degree of initiative, and flexibility. In the Virtualization team, we value quality awareness and a structured approach to work. As a solutions-oriented person with a passion for learning new technology, you will have the opportunity to build your career within Virtualization and make a real impact in the industry. This is an incredible opportunity to work with a strong team and be a part of a great working environment.  



  

  

**Your key areas of responsibility as a Systems Consultant:**

  
* Incident handling
* Troubleshooting
* Performance tuning/ stability issues
* Patching and upgrading
* Capacity management
* General development and improvement of the platforms

 **As an ideal candidate you have:**

+ Knowledge in VMware systems on a deep operational level (vRealize, vSAN, NSX-T)
+ Experience with working with containers on VMware Tanzu
+ Experience with cloud technologies like VMware vCloud
+ Working knowledge with administration tools like vRealize LogInsight, Operations Manager etc
+ Experience with VMware NSX-T network virtualization and security policy deployment and automation
+ Skills to do troubleshooting and to look for performance and/or stability problems
+ Knowledge in at least one of the following OS: Windows; Linux: Redhat, or other distribution

 **What we offer you:**

* Hybrid ways of working with access to our modern & collaborative offices in Oslo/ Stockholm
* We may work with tomorrow’s technology, but at our core we are a people-oriented organization and we are proud to have our Great Place to Work certification
* An open and inclusive culture, that enables us to reach our full potential
* A community of experts - as Digital Natives, we put innovation at the heart of our expertise
* Read more about the benefits we offer here for Stockholm and here for Oslo

 **About Orange Business:**


Orange Business is a leading network and digital integrator company with offices in 65 countries worldwide, and part of the Orange Group.


Digital Services, a business line of Orange Business is a newly created division within Orange Business. In Europe the business line consists of approximately 1500 people distributed across 9 countries. We are digital natives, with innovation at the core of our business, which makes us a reliable partner close to our customers. Our joint mission is to help innovate, drive and lead them in their digital transformation challenges and business strategies in key digital domains, including Cloud, Customer Experience, Digital Workspace and Data & AI. As an agile and fast-moving digital business partner, the business line offers trusted end-to-end solutions and products that help businesses in a wide range of industries in the private and public sector transform their operations, enhance customer experience, and drive growth.


With our digital expertise, we are a strategic partner of Orange Business objectives to be a leading network and digital integrator with our team as a key growth engine.

 **The process:**  

We screen applications on an ongoing basis, with the aim of conducting conversations and interviews as we receive them.


Interested but feel that you don´t match the criteria 100%? We encourage you to apply anyway! We believe in the potential of diverse skill sets, perspectives and individuality. We want to encourage everyone to be their authentic selves and your unique capabilities may align perfectly with our team's needs! Your perfect match might be the next job we are announcing, so why not have a head start and apply now!  

  



Are you interested to read more about Orange Business? Visit our Website or follow our LinkedIn account.




**Contrat**
-----------

CDI


Eligible au télétravail
company_description: Orange is one of the world’s leading telecommunications operators : sales of 42,3 billion euros in 2020 and 142,000 employees in 26 countries.

title: PhD Researcher, Financial Risk AI
description:
**About Clear Street:**



Clear Street is modernizing the brokerage ecosystem. Founded in 2018, Clear Street is a diversified financial services firm replacing the legacy infrastructure used across capital markets.



We started from scratch by building a completely cloud-native clearing and custody system designed for today's complex, global market. Our platform is fully integrated with central clearing houses and exchanges to support billions in trading volume per day. We've agonized about our data model abstractions, created horizontal scalability, and crafted thoughtful APIs. All so we can provide a best-in-class experience for our clients.



By combining highly-skilled product and engineering talent with seasoned finance professionals, we're building the essentials to compete in today's fast-paced markets.

  


**The Role:**



Clear Street is looking to hire one or more Industrial PhD candidates to do research in financial risk leveraging AI.



The full program will be 5 years with 80% of the time dedicated to research and 20% of the time working with Clear Street. You will be employed by Clear Street but the studies will be done at the university, and the matching department. There will be both a university PhD advisor and an industrial PhD advisor.



We are looking at seeking financing from The Wallenberg AI, Autonomous Systems and Software Program. WASP is a major national initiative for strategically motivated basic research, education and faculty recruitment. It is the largest individual research program in Sweden.

  


**Possible research areas**


* **Risk** - How can AI provide better risk management and avoid individual and institutional failures?
* **Execution** - How can AI more effectively execute orders into a market to obtain the best price possible to benefit individuals? (what is the next generation of TWAP, VWAP)
* **Funding** - How can we leverage AI to optimize the firm's use of cash and collateral?
* **Hedging** - How can AI construct and manage hedges to avoid unwanted portfolio risk?
* **Investment** - How can AI be used to construct and manage a portfolio to achieve a specific goal?

  



More information about WASP and the research they are doing can be found at WASP-Sweden

  


**You Bring:**


* Masters Degree with good academic grades
* Strong interest in AI and and financial technologies
* Commitment and drive to do research.
* 0-3 Years work experience within fintech.

  


**We offer:**


* The opportunity to join a small and growing team of good people, where you can make a difference.
* A chance to apply the result and findings of the PhD studies in real world scenarios.
* A meritocratic philosophy that champions collaboration.

  



Our top priority is our people. We're continuously investing in a culture that promotes collaboration. We help each other through challenges and celebrate each other's successes. We believe that modern workplaces succeed by virtue of having high-performance workforces that are diverse — in ideas, in cultures, and in experiences. We put in the effort to make such a workplace a daily reality and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. #LiHybrid
company_addresses: 4 World Trade Center Fl 45, New York, New York, 10007
company_description: Markets, Simplified. Our fast, efficient, cloud-native platform gives clients better access to capital markets.

title: Digital Kommunikatör
description:
Vill du vara med och fortsätta att befästa vår position som ledande varumärke och tillverkare inom Fritidsfordon i Norden samt en stark bidragsgivare till vår spännande tillväxtresa internationellt?
  
  

Vi söker nu dig som har bred kunskap inom kommunikation, digitala media och relaterad projektledning. Du är mycket kunnig och intresserad av digital marknadsföring, har hög prestationsnivå, är noggrann samt besitter den strategiska höjden, för att i rollen som Digital Kommunikatör, bidra till nya nivåer i vår marknadsföring och på våra plattformar.
  
  

ARBETSUPPGIF­­TER
  
* Skapande av engagerande och konverterande innehåll till sociala media, foto- och filmproduktion samt texter.
* Skapa kampanjer och annonser för Meta, programmatic och Google Ads. Uppföljning av statistik och optimering för bästa resultat.
* Produktion av tryckta annonser, vykort, vepor och liknande exponering.
* Kommunikation och samarbeten med återförsäljare, bolag i koncernen, externa partners, tidningar och press.
* Förbereda och deltaga på mässor och events.
* Produktion av katalog, strategiskt välja ut texter och layout för en premium produkt.


Marknadsavdelningens uppdrag är brett och omväxlande med ansvar för extern och intern kommunikation med fokus på KABE’s varumärke och alla våra kärnvärden. Du bidrar med innehåll till olika kanaler, för olika målgrupper och deltar i allt från utveckling av koncept och tonalitet till hands-on produktion. Du skapar rätt känsla både för print, video och digitalt, stöttar kollegor och värnar tydlighet. Du ser trender och har erfarenhet av att driva sociala medier kanaler, både organiskt innehåll och betalda kampanjer. På vår marknadsavdelning arbetar du tillsammans med kollegor ansvariga för innehåll som bild och video, formgivning, webb, sociala medier, evenemang, försäljning och mässor. Du tar gärna ansvar och projektleder marknadsföring kring mässor och event.
  
Våra målgrupper är nya såväl som mycket erfarna fritidsfordons-entusiaster i primärt Europa med en växande marknad internationellt. Då vi arbetar via Återförsäljare kommer du även ha en regelbunden kontakt med dessa och bidra till även deras kommunikation och digitala utveckling.
  
Vem söker vi?
  
Du är en generalist som gillar att arbeta flexibelt, praktiskt med strategi i åtanke. Du driver kampanjer i sociala medier lika enkelt som du skapar innehåll som sticker ut. Det faller sig naturligt för dig att parera flera projekt samtidigt och du stimuleras av att se ett resultat i arbetet. Vidare är du prestigelös som person och har en vilja att hjälpa andra då du blir en del av ett team. Slutligen är du noggrann och värdesätter att leverera ett arbete med god kvalité.
  
  

* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom relevant område
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska
* Några års arbetslivserfarenhet från en liknande roll som Kommunikatör eller likvärdig roll där du skapat, producerat och publicerat innehåll i digitala och analoga kanaler
* Erfarenhet av att driva sociala medier kanaler organiskt samt betalda kampanjer
* Meriterande med erfarenhet av att arbeta i Adobe Creative Cloud InDesign, Photoshop, Illustrator, Meta Buisness Suite, Google Ads, Youtube, LinkedIn, Office 365, Mailchimp, Canva, Program för att redigera kortare videos till sociala medier, Chat GPT eller liknande AI tjänst


Vad erbjuder vi?
  
Ett omväxlande och innovativt teamarbete i ett framgångsrikt företag med korta beslutsvägar. Vi värnar om en god arbetsmiljö med stimulerande arbetsuppgifter. Hos oss får du både den familjära stämningen och fördelarna med att ingå i en större koncern med kollegor och relationer både i Norden och internationellt.
  
  

För ytterligare information är du välkommen att kontakta Marknadschef Joakim Karlsson .
  
  

Välkommen att visa ditt intresse genom att skicka in ditt CV.
  
Urval och intervjuer kommer att ske löpande.
  
  

KABE AB är den största och ledande nordiska tillverkaren av husvagnar och husbilar med egen utveckling, design och produktion belägen i Tenhult, 10 km utanför Jönköping. KABE tillverkar och säljer husvagnar och husbilar till den europeiska marknaden genom varumärkena KABE och Affinity. Försäljningen av KABEs produkter sker uteslutande via återförsäljare och KABE har idag över 100 fristående återförsäljare på de bearbetade marknaderna runt om i Europa. KABE har idag c: a 700 anställda och majoriteten har Tenhult som sin bas.
  
KABE AB ingår i KABE Group och har sedan starten 1957 ständigt utvecklats och är idag en internationell koncern med produktion i Sverige, Storbritannien och Polen och försäljning på 14 marknader i Europa. Totalt omsätter koncernen c: a 4 miljarder kronor (2023) och antalet anställda uppgår till drygt 1 000 personer. KABE Group AB är noterat på OMX Nordiska Börs, Stockholm, Nordiska Listan, Mid Cap.
  
Inför rekryteringsarbetet har vi tagit ställning till rekryteringskanaler och marknadsföring. Vi undanber oss därför kontakt med mediesäljare, rekryteringssajter och liknande.

title: Content & CRM Coordinator
description:
**ABOUT THE COMPANY**

*Tiger of Sweden is a Stockholm-based fashion house established in 1903 with a heritage in tailoring. For more than a century Tiger of Sweden has stood for style with purpose, dressing men and women for whom true style is about the confidence to be themselves.*

**POSITION OVERVIEW:**


As the Content & CRM Coordinator, your primary responsibility will be to enrich and upload content on our website, ensuring a seamless and engaging customer experience. You will collaborate closely with various team members to create and curate compelling content, from product enrichment to multi-media assets. You will also play a pivotal role in executing our email marketing strategy for the full business. Leveraging your expertise in the CRM platform, you will segment our customer base, create target email campaign and with support from our Data Analyst review performance to optimize engagement and conversion through this channel.  

  



**TASKS & RESPONSIBILITIES:**

  

+ - Creating compelling and accurate product descriptions, enrichment of images and videos to showcase content on site to optimise engagement and conversion.
	- Optimise content through either product listing or on site to improve visibility and increase organic traffic.
	- Structure and manage the categorisation, content campaign relevance and seasonality to ensure consumer relevance and engagement.
	- Regularly update product information, content and availability to ensure on site accuracy.
	- Work with the eCom Data Analyst to review on site content and assess opportunities to improve KPIs such as conversion, click through rates and engagement metrics.
	- Implement strategies alongside the eCommerce Site Manager to personalise content and recommendations on consumer behaviour, preferences and demographics.
	- Adapt content for different markets and regions, including language translation, cultural nuances, and local regulations, to optimize the shopping experience for international customers.
+ Manage the CRM platform to ensure effective and consistent data capture, stores, and organizes customer information.
+ Collborate with the eCom Data Analyst to interpret consumer data to steer the CRM strategy optimised towards customer behaviour, preferences and trends through segmentation in various demographics.
+ Develop and execute customer communication strategies across various channels, including email, phone and SMS to increase retention and lifetime value of consumers.
Developing and implementing CRM strategies aligned with the company's business objectives and customer needs.  
+ 

**SKILLS & REQUIREMENTS:**

* Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work cross-functionally and manage multiple stakeholders.
* Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality work and exceptional customer experiences.
* Ability to adapt to changing priorities, work independently, and thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
* Bachelors degree in digital marketing, ecommerce or related field.
* Proven 2+ years experience in CRM and content within luxury/premium retail or consumer goods industry.
* Proficiency in ecommerce platforms and content management systems.
* Strong analytical skills with experience using web analytics tools to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.

**TOOLS & SYSTEMS**

* Salesforce Commerce Cloud suite
* Email Marketing Software such as Voyado, MailChimp, SF Marketing Cloud
* Proficient knowledge of all Microsoft Office
* Knowledge of PIM or product enrichment tools

The position is based in *our Head office in Stockhol*m and is a full-time position. *If this sounds like the perfect fit* for you? Please don't hesitate to apply by submitting a CV and personal letter in English.


We look forward to receiving your application.


Tiger of Sweden stands against any form of discrimination and strives to be an inclusive brand and workplace. We welcome applications from all individuals, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, race, or disability and recruitment is purely on the based on skills and experience.

title: Technical Support
description:
**Technical Support - DevCode Account Control AB** 




  





**Location: Stockholm, Sweden / Remote** 




  





**Join Us at DevCode Account Control AB!** 




 Are you skilled in providing detailed technical support and understand the importance of customer interaction in a technical context? We are seeking a dedicated Technical Support Specialist at DevCode Account Control AB to support our state-of-the-art SaaS platform, AccountIQ, aimed at enhancing financial operations worldwide.
 



  





**About Us:** 




 DevCode Account Control is at the forefront of financial reconciliation and reporting innovation. Our primary offering, AccountIQ, simplifies the reconciliation of transactions, retrieves wallet balances, and ensures centralized reporting across various payment providers.
 



  





**Your Role:** 




 As a Technical Support Specialist, you will:
 


* Offer expert technical assistance for our AccountIQ platform, helping clients navigate and resolve technical challenges.
* Act as a reliable point of contact for technical queries to enhance client experiences.
* Facilitate the onboarding of new clients and provide comprehensive training on our solutions.
* Work closely with our development team to relay customer feedback, contributing to the ongoing enhancement of our product.
* Monitor account performance with a focus on usage and client satisfaction, ensuring they align with client objectives and our service standards.


- 


**Requirements:** 



* Experience in technical support is beneficial but not required—we are looking for the right person who can grow into the role.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate technical information clearly.
* Excellent organizational and client relationship skills.
* Proficiency in English.


- 


**We Offer:** 



* An opportunity to work with groundbreaking software that is changing the landscape of financial transaction management.
* Flexible work options: remote or from our modern office in Stockholm.
* A competitive salary and benefits package.
* A dynamic, inclusive, and supportive team culture.


- 


**How to Apply:** 




 Interested in making a significant impact at a fast-growing tech company? Send your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your interest and potential fit for the role to jesper.svensson@devcode.se.
 



  





**We look forward to discovering how you can contribute to our team at DevCode!**

title: Cyber Security Consultant
description:
Coalesce Management Consultancy (CMC) has a consulting assignment available for an experienced Embedded Cyber Security Engineer in Stockholm. For one of our Automotive customers, you would only be expected to make very occasional trips to the site during this assignment, with most of the worst being completed remotely.
 



  





 Experience Needed:
 



  




* Has deep automotive cybersecurity experience
* Is proficient with ISO21434
* Is experienced with Cyber Security Management Systems
* Is familiar with key global security requirements in Type Approval & Homologation regulations, such as UNECE R155 & 156, and US FMVSS
